Pull Request Number: 570
Title: fix(docs, sb): handle tooltip what trigger with click
Base Branch: main
Head Branch: fix/docs-tooltip-trigger
Author: hyesungoh
URL: https://github.com/nextui-org/nextui/pull/570
State: CLOSED
Created At: 2022-06-25T19:55:31Z
Merged At: None
Participants: hyesungoh, jrgarciadev

Description:
Closes #569
Closes #538

📝 Description
Handle docs Tooltip what trigger with click to showing it's contents.
⛳️ Current behavior (updates)

Please describe the current behavior that you are modifying

https://nextui.org/docs/components/tooltip#trigger
https://nextui.org/docs/components/tooltip#custom-content
these Tooltip does not work.
also storyboard too.
🚀 New behavior

Please describe the behavior or changes this PR adds

replace Button what Tooltip's children to Link

  
    
    

    2022-06-26.4.51.25.mov
    
  

  

  



  
    
    

    2022-06-26.4.51.45.mov
    
  

  

  


💣 Is this a breaking change (Yes/No): No

📝 Additional Information
I think it is good to change all the buttons on the page to Link for uniformity.
If you think the same way as me, please leave a comment. I can handle it.

Commits:
- fix: replace Button to Link where tooltip with click trigger\n- fix: replace Button to Link at Tooltip's custom content\n- fix: replace Button to Link at Tooltip storyboard\n- chore: build and test\n

Labels:

10===character&&(line++,lines++,column=0),character==character?(queue+=fromCharCode(character),column++):flush();return result.join("");function now(){return{line:line,column:column,offset:index+(pos.offset||0)}}function parseError(code,offset){var position=now();position.column+=offset,position.offset+=offset,handleWarning.call(warningContext,messages[code],position,code)}function flush(){queue&&(result.push(queue),handleText&&handleText.call(textContext,queue,{start:prev,end:now()}),queue="")}}(value,settings)};var Token(type,content,alias,matchedStr){this.type=type,this.content=content,this.alias=alias,this.length=0|(matchedStr||"").length}function matchPattern(pattern,pos,text,lookbehind){pattern.lastIndex=pos;var match=pattern.exec(text);if(match&&lookbehind&&match[1]){var lookbehindLength=match[1].length;match.index+=lookbehindLength,match[0]=match[0].slice(lookbehindLength)}return match}function matchGrammar(text,tokenList,grammar,startNode,startPos,rematch){for(var LinkedList(){var head={value:null,prev:null,next:null},tail={value:null,prev:head,next:null};head.next=tail,this.head=head,this.tail=tail,this.length=0}function addAfter(list,node,value){var afterTokenizeGraphql(env){if("graphql"===env.language)for(var validTokens=env.tokens.filter((function(token){return"string"!=typeof token&&"comment"!==token.type&&"scalar"!==token.type})),currentIndex=0;currentIndex<validTokens.length;){var startToken=validTokens[currentIndex++];if("keyword"===startToken.type&&"mutation"===startToken.content){var inputVariables=[];if(isTokenType(["definition-mutation","punctuation"])&&"("===getToken(1).content){currentIndex+=2;var definitionEnd=findClosingBracket(/^\($/,/^\)$/);if(-1===definitionEnd)continue;for(;currentIndex<definitionEnd;currentIndex++){var t=getToken(0);"variable"===t.type&&(addAlias(t,"variable-input"),inputVariables.push(t.content))}currentIndex=definitionEnd+1}if(isTokenType(["punctuation","property-query"])&&"{"===getToken(0).content&&(currentIndex++,addAlias(getToken(0),"property-mutation"),inputVariables.length>0)){var validTokens[currentIndex+offset]}function isTokenType(types,offset){offset=offset||0;for(var i=0;i<types.length;i++){var
